subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
• Development, adoption and distribution of a handbook detailing peace-enabling small and micro-business activities successfully implemented by women, youth, ex-combatants, returnees, the handicapped and other vulnerable groups, to promote further national and international partnerships and best practices in Burundi (1,000 English and 1,000 French copies)
• 1 national conference for 80 participants and 4 regional workshops for 60 participants to share experiences and promote peace-enabling small and micro-business practices 
• Establishment of a marketplace in Bujumbura through which small and micro-entrepreneurs from rural areas are able to sell products
• Training of 20 micro-entrepreneurs in best business practices to serve as trainers
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Small & Micro-Businesses

subproject.description: Elaboration d'une stratégie nationale de d'un programme d'actions prioritaires en vue de définir comment le Tourisme pourrait devenir un secteur porteur d'opportunités, susceptibles de contribuer de manière significative à la revitalisation de son économie et à la consolidation de la paix.
subproject.title: Appui au secteur touristique
